title: Shield for Murder (restored, colorized) (1954, film noir, imdb score: 6.8)

sources.title: Shield for Murder (restored, colorized) (1954, film noir, imdb score: 6.8)
sources.description: Shield for Murder is a 1954 American film noir crime film codirected by and starring Edmond O'Brien as a malevolent police detective. It is based on the novel of the same name written by William P. McGivern .
